titleStmt.title: Devotions in the ancient way of offices. With psalms, hymns, and prayers for every day of the week and every holiday in the year. / Reformed by A person of quality, ; and published by George Hickes, D.D.
titleStmt.author: Birchley, William, 1613-1669.

titleStmt.title: Devotions in the ancient way of offices. With psalms, hymns, and prayers for every day of the week and every holiday in the year. / Reformed by A person of quality, ; and published by George Hickes, D.D.
titleStmt.author: Birchley, William, 1613-1669.
Hopton, Susanna, 1627-1709.
Hickes, George, 1642-1715.
Dorrington, Theophilus, d. 1715.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Jones at the Bell, in St.-Paul's Church-Yard,

notesStmt.note: Written by John Austin (known under his pseud. William Birchley) but sometimes ascribed to Theophilus Dorrington. Cf. DNB.
The work was "reformed" by Susanna Hopton. Cf. DNB.
This item appears at reel 842:3 as Wing D1243 (number cancelled in Wing 2nd. ed), and at reel 2263:1 as Wing (2nd ed.) A4250C.
Reproduction of original of 842:3 in Cambridge University Library.
Reproduction of original of 2263:1 in William Andrews Clark Memorial Library, University of California, Los Angeles, California.
